title: Frontend responsiveness across mobile, iPad/tablet, and desktop

requirements.summary: Make all routes render responsively at common breakpoints without horizontal scrolling or clipped content.
acceptanceCriteria: At viewport widths ~360px (mobile), ~768px (tablet), and ~1280px (desktop), every route renders without horizontal scrolling.
No text, buttons, cards, images, or dialogs overflow their containers; content reflows appropriately.
Tap targets on mobile (buttons/links) are not cramped and remain accessible without accidental taps.

file_operations.description: Adjust the root layout containers to be overflow-safe across routes (e.g., ensure main content uses responsive padding and prevent accidental horizontal overflow from layout wrappers).
Add/adjust global base rules that prevent horizontal overflow (e.g., ensure media elements don’t exceed container width, long words wrap, and the overall page avoids horizontal scrolling).
Refine the shared Section wrapper to enforce consistent responsive padding/max-width behavior and prevent child overflow across pages (e.g., ensure container uses safe gutters on small screens).
Tighten responsive typography/spacing and ensure prose and grids do not overflow on small screens (no clipped text or wide blocks).

Ensure both desktop grid and mobile accordion layouts have overflow-safe card content (titles/descriptions/prices wrap correctly, no horizontal scroll). Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Accordion components in an overflow-safe way; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Make offer card header layouts resilient on narrow widths (icon/title/badge wrapping and spacing) and ensure no overflow. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button components responsively; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Make the contact grid, quick action buttons, and embedded map container responsive (stack properly on mobile; prevent fixed heights from causing overflow/clipping). Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Button components responsively; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the admin page layout uses responsive stacking, safe gutters, and wrapping so forms/tabs/actions never extend off-screen. Use existing shadcn-ui Tabs/Card/Form components responsively; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make the header navigation (brand, search, nav actions) responsive across mobile/tablet/desktop with no overlap or overflow.
acceptanceCriteria: On mobile, the hamburger menu and mobile nav render without overflow; opening the menu shows all links and the search input fully within the viewport.
On tablet sizes, the header does not feel cramped: spacing is balanced and elements do not overlap; the search and nav are displayed using appropriate breakpoints.
On desktop, the existing layout (logo + search + nav + social) remains aligned, with consistent vertical centering and no layout shift when navigating between pages.

file_operations.description: Rework header flex behavior and breakpoint rules so brand/search/nav/social never overlap or overflow (e.g., ensure brand text can wrap/truncate appropriately, flex children use min-w-0, and mobile menu panel is viewport-contained). Use existing shadcn-ui Button component for consistent tap targets; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the global search input and results trigger area are width-constrained and responsive within header/mobile menu contexts (no overflow, proper spacing at narrow widths). Use existing shadcn-ui input-related UI components as already integrated; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make key Home page sections (hero, cuisine grid, multi-column sections) transition cleanly from mobile single-column to tablet/desktop multi-column with correct typography and image behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero content (logo, heading, subtitle, CTA buttons) fits on mobile screens without clipping and with readable line-lengths.
Cuisine cards display as 1 column on small screens, 2 columns on small/medium screens where appropriate, and 3–4 columns on larger screens (no awkward partial columns or overflow).
Images keep correct aspect ratios and do not stretch; they remain within their cards/containers at all breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Refine hero spacing/typography and CTA layout for small screens; ensure grids and multi-column sections use responsive gap/columns and don’t cause overflow. Ensure card images maintain aspect ratio and remain contained. Use existing shadcn-ui Card/Badge/Button components responsively; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add/adjust any global responsive typography or utility-safe defaults needed by the Home page (e.g., improved wrapping/line-breaking for headings on narrow widths) without introducing page-specific styles.

requirements.summary: Make Menu Management responsive (tabs, forms, action buttons) so it remains fully usable on mobile and tablet.
acceptanceCriteria: TabsList remains usable on narrow screens (wraps cleanly or becomes horizontally scrollable without breaking layout).
Form grids (category fields and item fields) stack into a single column on mobile and become multi-column on larger viewports.
Primary actions (Save Changes / Reset / Logout) remain visible and usable on mobile without forcing sideways scrolling.

file_operations.description: Update the page layout to stack header/actions on mobile, keep primary actions accessible, and make the TabsList responsive (wrap or horizontal scroll) without breaking content. Use existing shadcn-ui Tabs/TabsList/TabsTrigger and form components; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Ensure footer grid and contact/social sections collapse and wrap cleanly across breakpoints.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer sections render as a single-column stack on mobile, two columns on medium screens, and up to four columns on large screens, without overlap.
Contact rows (address/phone/hours) wrap neatly without icon/text collision.
Footer links and buttons remain readable and do not overflow their containers.

file_operations.description: Refine footer grid and internal flex rows so contact lines wrap cleanly (no icon/text collision) and sections maintain spacing/alignment at mobile/tablet/desktop. Use existing shadcn-ui Button/Separator components responsively; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
